trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Battle Creek
There were no other sightings in Battle Creek on or around August 27th 2010
Summary: Orange circle or ball moving aprox 2000 feet high no safety lights speeding up pausing radical.
divs: Sighting Detailswent out side to smoke and this is the third time in a week i have saw this noticed a star shaped object orange in color moving at a decent speed it would pause and start moving again come to a stop and start moving again . it diappeared out of sight or got smaller quickly . saw the same thing about two nights ago but it was moving side to side pausing and moving same area , was in the urbandale area saw a white bright ball of light last night moving straight line quickly but not zipping fast no safety lights again . but you also could not make a form of wings was round .in all occasions there was no plane sound ,.
